items.content_text: üòå Mom woke up from the surgery, we don't know everything just yet, but it's a good sign. Thank you for crossing your fingers for us. So much stress relieved in a single phone call.

items.content_html: I’ve decided against buying an older phone (13 Pro) and I’m unable to spend that amount of money to get 14 Pro. I wanted to have better battery so 14 Plus it is. My wife is gonna get my 11 Pro (she has SE, so that’s an upgrade). In case of great September I’m still open:)
items.content_text: I've decided against buying an older phone (13 Pro) and I'm unable to spend that amount of money to get 14 Pro. I wanted to have better battery so 14 Plus it is. My wife is gonna get my 11 Pro (she has SE, so that's an upgrade). In case of great September I'm still open:)

items.content_html: My mom is going to have a serious medical procedure in the morning, if you can - please keep fingers crossed. I‚Äôd really appreciate it.

items.content_html: Because of how Mastodon works with data, it’s unsustainable for me to run my own Mastodon instance. It’s just either getting pricey with S3 or with hosting provider. And I’m already fine with micro.blog and social.lol instance. Bye, bye!

items.content_html: My own (social.Orzech.me) instance of Mastodon is becoming really, really big. Without my input it grew to 8GB of disk space. That‚Äôs‚Ä¶ not optimistic. Not sure if I‚Äôm gonna keep it around then. I might try Pleroma or Misskey instead so it‚Äôs a bit lighter on resources?
